document.full_text: upscale retailer nordstrom inc  cut its full-year earnings forecast due to the dilutive effect of its hautelook acquisition, sending shares down 1.7 percent.
document.title: nordstom cuts 2011 eps on hautelook acquisition
lines_and_colors: upscale retailer nordstrom inc  cut its full-year earnings forecast due to the dilutive effect of its hautelook acquisition, sending shares down 1.7 percent.
